event.name: Gartner Business Intelligence Information Management Summit
event.description: Gartner Business Intelligence Summit 2010 offers research, strategy, technology solutions and best practices for BI, information management, data quality and integration through analysts, peer networking and industry exhibitors.

event.name: Gartner CIO Leadership Forum
event.description: Gartner CIO Leadership Forum is an executive-only program for exploring critical business, technology and leadership strategies. CIOs will discover how to translate strategic direction into actionable results, achieve the innovation required for competitive business advantage.

event.name: Enterprise Architecture Foundation Seminar
event.description: A unique, two-day learning experience - learn the fundamentals of developing a world-class EA program. In this two-day seminar, you'll learn a disciplined process - from planning to implementation - that focuses on the enterprise as a holistic system of systems and delivers the agility, speed and integration your business needs.

event.name: Gartner CIO Leadership Forum
event.description: Gartner CIO Leadership Forum offers you an interactive, workshop-centric experience to exchange ideas and receive actionable guidance from prominent CIOs, Gartner experts and senior executives from leading technology providers. It focuses on helping to turn your insights into actionable results.

event.name: Gartner Infrastructure, Operations Data Centre Summit
event.description: The Gartner Infrastructure, Operation and Data Centre Summit delivers tactics and strategies to address your hottest issues: next-stage virtualization, the impact of cloud computing, best practices in cost optimization, managing escalating energy costs, the aging infrastructure, and more.

event.name: Gartner Infrastructure, Operations Data Centre Summit
